post:
Hello LET!

Connected via Level3, CenturyLink, Verizon, Yipes, XO, Zayo, TWtelecom, and Comcast. Accept no less than the best. We are located in Denver, CO, with amazing network connectivity to all locations! If you are looking to have a low latency coast to coast application for the US, we are in a prime location with prime transit!

About Us

TACServers was formed in 2007 to provide quality service at an exceptional price. We have yet to stray from this mission. We strive to provide the highest level of technical service possible, and will work with you to establish a stable online presence. We own all our own hardware, we do not have outstanding debts, and are here for the long term.

TACServers bases itself on the pride and ethics we believe is needed to run any type of hosting company. We believe that every server should be maintained at an acceptable load level, and we strive to never oversell our resources. Our OpenVZ nodes are under-allocated, leaving 10-14GB of RAM for caching the FS, and thus, VPS files. Our KVM VPS's allow migration between our multiple nodes. Our team is based out of the United States and have years of networking and Linux/Windows experience!

TACServers' goal is to make you, the customer, happy. We are proud to call all our customers business partners. Our mission statement: Anything we can do to make you happy, makes us happy! We grow as you grow, and without YOU, the client, we would have nothing to do! Many people neglect the importance of the customer, but not TACServers.

We have other plans that the promo code applies to! Take a look at our site, and find just what you are looking for!

Here's our OpenVZ VPS plans being offered today!

US Based Support

Limited availibility on this Promo code! Get it while it lasts! Our stock is limited by IP's and justification, we use them up, we have a justifiable need for more.

TACLET2 = 50% Off, Recurring for 3 Months

All accounts will be provisioned manually post abuse/fraud verification. Please use our support desk if you have any issues. IPv6 is HE.net tunnel until native IPv6 blocks are routed. We have a 10gbit connect to HE, and sub 2ms pings to the tunnel server, but in the interest of transparency...

Those of you looking for Colocation in the Denver area looking for a Discount, I'll remove 25% off of listed colocation prices on our website!

http://www.tacservers.net/colocation.html
